resources.string:
Were you prompted to install this app from Amazon MTURK?
\n\nPlease note: We will not be able to pay you for your participation without properly answering this question.
I have entered my MTURK token!

Your MTURK token is printed below. 
You will need to enter this token on the Amazon MTURK page to get your payment!

You marked that you were not redirected to this app from MTURK.


Please confirm that this is correct.
Consent to Participate in Research\n Understanding Smartphone Sensors

In order for you to understand your participation in this study, please read this entire disclosure.


This app is part of a study to explore the possibility of inferring user information from benign smartphone sensors, like the step counter or compass.


This app will silently collect periodic sensor measurements.It will also collect GPS data. All collected data will be kept on our secure servers. The data will be maintained for possible future research. Only anonymous, non-identifiable data (ie, not GPS) would be shared with other researchers. Data collection will have minimal impact on your phone performance and battery life. 

Your participation in this study will involve 1 required survey in addition to brief daily optional surveys.


For Amazon MTURK participants:


- $0.25 for downloading and installing the app 
- $1 for each daily survey you submit 
- $2 for 1 week complete participation in the study


This research will not benefit you directly. However, it will indirectly benefit you and other smartphone users by informing system designers of the data implications from benign sensors.


Some of the research questions may make you uncomfortable or upset. You are free to decline to answer and stop the study at any time. You may also uninstall the app at any time to stop the study.


If you any survey content objectionable, you are free to abstain from answering or entirely ending your participation in the study.


The risks for this study are minimal: these involve a potential breach of confidentiality for GPS data and other location data. We will encrypt data to decrease the probability of such a breach.


If you have any questions or concerns about your rights and treatment as a research subject, you may contact the office of UC Berkeley's Committee for the Protection of Human Subjects, at 510-642-7461 or subjects@berkeley.edu. Reference: CPHS# 2015-11-8097


If you have any questions or concerns about this study, you may contact our team at:


Sensors Inference Project Team 
sensor-inference@icsi.berkeley.edu 
Computer Science Department, UC Berkeley 
International Computer Science Institute

You chose to deny permissions that this app needs to collect data.
 Please recall that the app will not collect any personally identifiable information besides GPS. All data that is collected will be stored securely.


Please note: You will not be paid the $2.00 completion bonus without participating in this portion of the study.


The app will now close. If this is a mistake, you may restart the app and accept the permissions.

You will now be directed to complete a short survey for some demographic information needed for this research. As always, your data will be kept securely and confidentially.


Please note: You will not be paid the $2.00 completion bonus without participating in this portion of the study.

MTURK Status: [ VERIFIED ] 

You marked that you are an MTURK user and that you submitted your verification code on the MTURK HIT page. 
This information must be correct in order for you to receive your payment in the study. 
If there is a mistake, please email sensor-inference@icsi.berkeley.edu and explain the case. Include your UUID (printed above) in the email.

MTURK Status: [ NOT VERIFIED ] 

You marked that you are not an MTURK user and we have not collected a verification code on our MTURK HIT page. 
However, if you are indeed an MTURK user, we will need to correct this mistake ASAP for you to receive your payment in the study. 
If there is a mistake, please email sensor-inference@icsi.berkeley.edu and explain the case. Include your UUID (printed above) in the email.

As part of your participation in the UCB Sensor Inference Study, we would like to give you a short survey that will take 1-2 minutes of your time. 


Though every daily survey is optional, you will be given a $1 bonus for each daily survey you complete. 
 Would you like to complete today's survey?

Thank you for participating in our research project! \n\n One week has passed since you installed our app, so you are officially done with your participation. You can now proceed to uninstall the app.
This app is for a study at UC Berkeley to better understand smartphone sensors. This application will log various sensor data over the course of one week.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
